title: Mortgage Inequality Explorer
description: Explore U.S. mortgage access and inequality, 2018â€“2023, with interactive maps and plots. Analyze census tract data (HMDA) by income, race, and neighborhood, integrating FRED rates for macro context.

title: Bikewatching
description: Interactive visualization tracking bike traffic patterns and infrastructure. Analyzes urban mobility data to highlight usage trends.

title: Persuasive or Deceptive Visualization
description: Advanced data visualization project exploring complex datasets with interactive web-based plotting techniques using D3.js.

title: Comparing Decadal Warming in the Central and Western Equatorial Pacific
description: Comprehensive data analysis project utilizing statistical modeling, exploratory data analysis, and hypothesis testing.

title: NBA All-Star Prediction
description: Supervised ML pipeline predicting NBA All-Star selections with 99% ROC-AUC. Implemented logistic regression from scratch with L2 regularization using 15,000 player-seasons.

title: Sports Betting Behavior
description: Analyzed real-time odds movement (EPL, NFL) vs. betting behavior using live API data. Applied EDA and regression to evaluate risk and payout outcomes.

title: LoL Match Prediction
description: Logistic regression and gradient boosting on pro match data. Audited for fairness with >95% accuracy and analysis of blue-side bias.

title: Medical Bill Decoder
description: iOS app utilizing NLP to translate medical bills and estimate costs with visual breakdowns of charges.
